verses.name: John 2:1
verses.text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee; and the mother of Jesus was there:

verses.name: John 2:2
verses.text: And both Jesus was called, and his disciples, to the marriage.

verses.name: John 2:3
verses.text: And when they wanted wine, the mother of Jesus saith unto him, They have no wine.

verses.name: John 2:4
verses.text: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, what have I to do with thee? mine hour is not yet come.

verses.name: John 2:5
verses.text: His mother saith unto the servants, Whatsoever he saith unto you, do it.
